Text:
Thanks my friend.

A worthy contribution!

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * *

Only the first episode is 16 x 9 wide-screen format.

The rest are only 4 x 3 and cropped

Disappointing since you state these as ALL in wide-screen format - THEY ARE NOT!

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *

@kiplittle:
You are partially right - the episodes 3, 4 and 5 are indeed in 4:3 format.
The episodes 1+2, 6, 7 and 8 are in 16:9.
That still doesn't excuse that I failed to check the files properly, and I am humbly sorry for that!

Konashine has a nice high quality pack:
https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6312232/The_Kennedys_Series_Complete_720p
and in case you like to download episodes 3, 4 and 5 in 16:9 format here are the links to the scene releases:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6309568/The.Kennedys.Part3.HDTV.XviD-MOMENTUM
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6309576/The.Kennedys.Part4.HDTV.XviD-MOMENTUM
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6309592/The.Kennedys.Part5.HDTV.XviD-MOMENTUM

Again I am deeply sorry!
Cheers
who gives a shit, great that you have them available in a bundle thank you

*UCK YOU "kiplittle"
manOtor is doing a great job for uploading these excellent files. I deeply appreciate these manOtor. And kiplittle, I don't see you uploading these files ?!?   So what the *uck, Why are you complaining?

*UCK YOU kiplittle !!!
